一頭半個月換一次

最好唔好飲
飛機洗水箱都係用藥水溝水打入水箱洗
乾唔乾淨自己諗
同埋加水係用水車，架水車水幾年驗過大腸桿菌超標
不過係gallery出水前都有個filter隔吓既

廁所馬桶同洗手盤都會落waste tank落到地下先會有屎車吸屎，唔會空中扔屎
gallery sink就經肚底直接排走
所以有d airline有規定茶啡要倒落廁所廢事整烏糟肚底

American shies away from 777X or 787-10 for growth

25 MAY, 2018 SOURCE: FLIGHT DASHBOARD BY: EDWARD RUSSELL WASHINGTON DC
American Airlines will grow its international network through various aircraft and scheduling efficiencies, and not through ordering the latest large widebodies.

Neither the Boeing 777X nor the Boeing 787-10 are in the Fort Worth, Texas-based carrier's fleet plan currently, says Vasu Raja, vice-president of network & schedule planning at American, in response to a question about widebody fleet growth in an employee newsletter on 24 May.

"There is definitely some growth built into our fleet plan," he says. "Buying new planes is just one way to achieve that growth. Others include using larger aircraft, flying them farther… or using our aircraft throughout more of the day, meaning scheduling them more efficiently."

The question referred to American's order for 47 787s, including 22 -8s and 25 -9s, in April. The airline emphasised at the time that the deal was to replace its Airbus A330-300, Boeing 767-300ER and some of its 777-200 fleets, and not for growth.

For example, the 787-8s, which arrive from 2020 to 2022, replace the carrier's 767-300ERs on a one-for-one basis.

The 787-8 and 787-9 are medium-sized widebody aircraft, with American configuring the former with 226 seats and the latter with 285 seats. The largest aircraft in its fleet, the 777-300ER, has 310 seats.

The 777-8X, the smallest of the two variants, will seat 350-375 passengers in a two-class configuration, and the 787-10 seats 330 passengers in a two-class configuration, Boeing's website shows.

American has a strong preference for fleet commonality suggesting that if in the future it decided to take a more serious look at the 777X and 787-10, the latter would likely have a leg up due to its large fleet of 787s.

The airline likely will be able to grow international flying with a streamlined fleet of new 787s, compared to its motley pairing of small fleets of A330s and 767s today. It will likely get higher levels of utilisation from Dreamliners than the older aircraft, and be able to simplify its scheduling reducing the need for spares.

Boeing has firm orders for 10 777Xs with no variant selected, 53 777-8s, 263 777-9s and 167 787-10s, Flight Fleets Analyzer shows. In addition, there are four 787-10s in service with Singapore Airlines.

No US carrier has ordered either 777X variant, while United Airlines has orders for 14 787-10s, the database shows.

Raja, in typical airline management style, adds in his note that American is "always looking out into the future to evaluate our long-term needs" when it comes to aircraft.

replies.msg:
咩full scale deflation? Structure? Control Surfaces?

ABCD Check - Base Maintenance
維修主要分Line同Base啦。
如果你當飛機係人，Line Maintenance就係急症，而Base Maintenance 係定期檢查。
而A至D 順序check interval 下降但工作量上升。
視乎飛機型號同Operator既Maintenance Programme, A check 大概一年一次，一次一兩日。D check就十年一次，一次可以幾星期或更多。依家冇B check架喇。

replies.msg:
1) 香港會印曬2張boarding pass 俾你，如果你有寄艙行李到羽田要等行李，再出海關，出左就轉去轉國內線counter 再寄行李，寄完向後行過X光，落電梯撘巴士去國內線terminal.

返香港就係新千歲排轉乘國際線，行李會同你直掛香港，到成田直接轉機就得

2) 767 係 2-3-2 ，坐邊冇乜分別，有位就劃15-18，前啲，靜啲，好訓啲，落機快啲，不過你有小朋友同行就要考慮會唔會嘈到人，坐前面喊一定會俾人閪面
國內線空姐通常會同BB玩，再送postcard /Memo /玩具。

3) 你下就機，有需要24小時前可以加4000円入下Longue，沖下涼食下咖哩飯拉麵休息下

4)你張國內線可以當日改早出發既機，玩到冇嘢玩可以改早做快閃成田/東京，不過記得睇交通時間

偽港航融資70億　短中期擬上市

事隔四年，海航旗下偽香港航空再考慮上市！路透昨引述消息人士透露，偽港航考慮於「短期至中期內」上市，在上市之前，公司正計劃透過發行新股及可轉換債融資約70億元。

偽港航正尋求一筆3.5億美元（約27.3億港元）股本融資，預計將會擴大股本22%，其最新估值約16億美元（約125億港元）。偽港航同時希望透過出售可轉換債融資5.5億美元（約43億港元），有關債券提供息率約8至10厘，兩至五年期。偽港航今年目標收入149.7億元，2015至2018年期間，年複合增長率15%；去年EBITDAR增長11.4%至42.1億元。

本報就事件向偽香港航空查詢，公司回覆指對上市報道「不予置評」。

偽港航2014年傳出計劃以「雙股雙幣」（股民可以港元或人民幣認購新股）上市，並已遞交上市申請，但傳最終因監管機構「問長問短」而擱置。有市場人士指，由於時機已過，若偽港航今次真是上市，以「雙股雙幣」形式的機會甚微。

早前有傳新加坡主權投資機構淡馬錫有意入股偽港航及偽香港快運航空，但僅考慮持有少數股份。相關金額及股份比例未見披露。

法國航空和澳洲航空續簽合作夥伴協議
為往返法澳旅客提供更多旅行選擇

• 法國航空和澳洲航空續簽代碼共用協議
• 經香港和新加坡連接澳大利亞和巴黎
• 自2018年7月20日起，每週有200(1)多個代碼共用航班
• 旅客出行更加簡便，提升旅行體驗

2018年5月29日，北京——法國航空和澳洲航空兩家公司續簽代碼共用協議，通過亞洲城市中轉，為歐洲和澳洲之間往返的乘客提供更多出行選擇(2)。

自6月5日起，預定2018年7月20日以後出發的航班，法航將通過代碼共用的形式，與澳航共同運營往返香港與雪梨、墨爾本以及布里斯班之間的航班；以及往返新加坡與雪梨、墨爾本、布里斯班以及珀斯之間的航班。

法航的乘客還可通過代碼共用服務，利用澳航的國內航線網路，從雪梨飛往坎培拉、霍巴特、阿德萊德、凱恩斯和達爾文五個城市。

依據此項互惠協議，澳航也將與法航以代碼共用的形式執飛新加坡——巴黎、香港——巴黎航線，接續從雪梨、布里斯班、墨爾本與珀斯出發的航班。

新的合作協定簽署後，兩家航空公司將通過代碼共用的方式每週運營超過200(1)個航班。

乘客將享受到更加無縫的旅行體驗，包括單程旅程和行李直掛托運，並可通過新的代碼共用航班累計里程。

部分法航乘客(3)可使用香港、新加坡以及澳大利亞機場的澳航休息室；同樣，部分澳航乘客也可使用法航位於巴黎、香港與新加坡機場的休息室。

法航荷航集團商務、銷售及聯盟執行副總裁裴安德先生表示：“我們很高興能夠與澳洲航空再度建立合作夥伴關係。憑藉此次合作，法航荷航集團將為其往返歐洲與澳洲的旅客提供又一最佳旅行方案選擇。同時，此項協議還將為我們的商務旅客帶來更好的旅行體驗，便於他們在全球備受歡迎的新加坡與香港機場轉機。此次新合作也是我們致力於拓展亞太市場的有力證明。”

澳洲航空公司國際首席執行官Alison Webster女士表示：“對於想要在亞洲轉機飛往歐洲的這部分旅客來說，兩家公司的合作是一則好消息。無論旅客的目的地在何處，雙方再次進行代碼共用戰略合作，將為旅客提供更加廣闊的航線網路，令其享受更加無縫的旅行體驗。”

Oneworld Connect brings Fiji Airways into the fold

https://www.ausbt.com.au/oneworld-connect-brings-fiji-airways-into-the-fold

Fiji Airways will join Oneworld as first member of the alliance's new Oneworld Connect program, announced today at the IATA airline summit in Sydney.

Oneworld Connect offers what could be called a 'membership lite' package for the alliance, and will be less arduous for an airline compared to taking out full membership.

Each Oneworld Connect partner will need to be sponsored by at least three Oneworld members – a tally which shouldn’t be hard to reach, given that the alliance counts 13 members on its books – with Qantas, American Airlines and British Airways all behind Fiji Airways.

How does this play out for the traveller?

Oneworld Connect partners will provide a baseline of benefits to frequent flyers from any Oneworld member airline, with a more extensive range of benefits offered on the partner's sponsor airlines.

That baseline sees travellers holding Oneworld Ruby, Sapphire and Emerald status (in Australia that’s equivalent to Qantas Silver, Gold and Platinum) able to use the priority check-in desks of a Oneworld Connect member, with priority boarding available with a flash of your Oneworld Sapphire and Emerald card.

There's a better set of benefits for toop-tier frequernt flyers from the sponsors of a Oneworld Connect airline: through check-in of luggage, earning and redeeming points, earning status credits plus lounge access for first and business class passengers and Oneworld Sapphire and Emerald cardholders.

Oneworld Connect members will also be added to the roster for Oneworld’s Global Explorer round-the-world fare.

While Fiji Airways has been announced as the first Oneworld Connect member, the alliance was unable to name a date for when those benefits would kick in.

Oneworld says it is in discussion with other carriers “from various parts of the world including the Americas, Asia-Pacific and Europe.”

"With most of the world's biggest airlines already signed up, global airline alliances have reached maturity," opines Oneworld Governing Board Chairman, Finnair CEO Pekka Vauramo.

"In the future, Oneworld will target as full members large airlines that have a significant presence in the alliance's prime markets, providing connections between the world's leading business centres."

"Meanwhile, Oneworld Connect enables us to bring together more airlines to complement the alliance's global leaders, so customers can earn rewards and feel recognised while travelling even further."

However, Oneworld CEO Rob Gurney would not be drawn on the comparison between Oneworld Connect and the Connecting Partners model of competitor Star Alliance.

"We don't really compare the two," he told Australian Business Traveller. "What we have developed is a program that is specific to Oneworld and appropriate for Oneworld and its members."

東海航空將以737直飛澳洲

以深圳為據點的東海航空，將成為大陸第一家以波音737-800客機直飛澳洲達爾文的航班。

未來每周會有兩班由東海航空提供，從深圳直飛達爾文港的空中服務，航程預計為五小時又40分鐘。採用737-800窄體客機，將大幅減少此一洲際航線服務的開銷，為航空公司與旅客都減少開銷。

不過等明年東海航空接收737 Max 8開始，這批737-800的地位就會慢慢為737 Max 8所取代。

唔熟飛機設計 有個無聊問題想問問 假設由A飛去B 所有條件因素一樣情況下
唔同型號機型(eg. a350 vs b787) 會唔會有時間上分別
假設大家都開行Turbo 邊架會最快到目的地
又或者大細機比較(A380 vs A320之類) 有無速度上分別
點為之所有條件因素
唔同機型有唔同起飛；巡航；降落速度

巡航速度好易上網Check到，巡航距離越長，巡航速度對飛行時間影響越大

起飛/降落速度要睇架機設計同負重
